channel.title: Tutorials on a Coding Monkey

item.title: Host a GitHub Page with Hugo
item.description: Host a GitHub Page with Hugo # This article is a step-by-step guide to setup a blog page like this one. The tools used for this purpose are HUGO, GitHub with GitHub pages and the command line. At the end of this tutorial I will cover automated post creation and site updates using shell functions. Since I’m using ZSH as my shell - if you’re on BASH, these may not work exactly the same for you.
